headline: Workday Stock Joins The 95-Plus Composite Rating Club
summary: Workday stock saw an improvement in its IBD SmartSelect Composite Rating Friday, from 94 to 97.  The upgrade means the stock currently tops 97% of all other stocks in terms of key performance metrics and technical strength.  Is Workday Stock A Buy?

headline: Salesforce’s AI Suite Makes for a Convincing Story, Analysts Say, While Risks Emerge at ServiceNow
summary: Salesforce  and  ServiceNow  may be rivals in the enterprise software space, but KeyBanc analysts said one company has potential for growth while the other is poised to fall behind.  Shares of  Salesforce  were climbing 1.7% in premarket trading Friday after KeyBanc upgraded the stock to Overweight from Sector Weight and set a price target of $440.  The firm downgraded  ServiceNow  to Sector Weight from Overweight, citing “risks with limited multiple expansion potential.”
